agent_instructions.purpose: Analyze the project and make meaningful improvements based on the project-specific prompt
guidelines: Make only ONE meaningful change per run to allow for incremental review
Prefer simple, well-documented solutions over complex systems
Write clean, maintainable code with clear comments
Include usage documentation for any new features
Consolidate when functionality overlaps - merge similar components
Prefer enhancing existing code over creating new files when logical
Before creating something new, review existing code to determine if the feature could be added there
Update any manifest or tracking files to reflect changes
improvement_priorities: Add missing features to incomplete implementations
Create new features only when existing code cannot be reasonably extended

forbidden_actions: modifying files outside the project directory
pushing to git (handled automatically by runner)
